meanings.definition: A small cucumber pickled in vinegar.
meanings.sent1: I love adding a gherkin to my sandwich for extra crunch.
meanings.sent2: The deli always serves gherkins with their sandwiches.
meanings.sent3: Why did the pickle go to the dance? To find its gherkin!
meanings.sent4: The gherkin in the jar stood out like a bright green gem.
meanings.sent5: The tangy gherkin added a burst of flavor to the salad.

meanings.definition: A small prickly fruit of a tropical vine, used for pickling.
meanings.sent1: The chef used a gherkin to add a unique flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent2: The market sells fresh gherkins for pickling at home.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cactus give the gherkin a hug? It was feeling prickly too!
meanings.sent4: The gherkin on the vine looked like a tiny green hedgehog.
meanings.sent5: The spiky gherkin added an interesting texture to the salad.
